mapper.sql: HISTORY_ID, SUPPLIERS_ID, SUPPLIERS_NAME, SUPPLIERS_CODE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, ALT_DATE, ALT_TYPE
mapper.insert: insert into HZ_ALT_SUPPLIERS_TABLE (HISTORY_ID, SUPPLIERS_ID, SUPPLIERS_NAME, SUPPLIERS_CODE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, ALT_DATE, ALT_TYPE) values (#{historyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{suppliersId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{suppliersName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suppliersCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{altDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{altType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update HZ_ALT_SUPPLIERS_TABLE set SUPPLIERS_ID = #{suppliersId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUPPLIERS_NAME = #{suppliersName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIERS_CODE = #{suppliersCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALT_DATE = #{altDate,jdbcType=DATE}, ALT_TYPE = #{altType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where HISTORY_ID = #{historyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
